alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 2:02PM MDT until August 10 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 202 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Grover to 7 miles northwest of Jackson Reservoir, or along a line extending from 39 miles southwest of Kimball to 24 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Keota around 210 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
